name: Astral Projection
text: Hero Action (thwart): Choose a scheme → remove 3 threat from that scheme and look at the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon on that card, remove 1 additional threat from the chosen scheme.

flavor: "Nothing is impossible for the Sorcerer Supreme!" -- Doctor Strange
name: Master of the Mystic Arts
text: Hero Action: Pay the printed cost of the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck → resolve its "Special" ability. Then, place it back on top of the [[Invocation]] deck faceup.

name: Iron Fist
text: Iron First enters play with 2 mystic counters on him. Response: When Iron Fist attacks an enemy, remove 1 mystic counter from him → stun that enemy and deal 1 damage to it.

name: Desperate Defense
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +2 DEF for that attack. If you take no damage from that attack, ready your hero.

name: The Night Nurse
text: Uses (3 medical counters). Action: Exhaust The Night Nurse and remove 1 medical counter from her → heal 1 damage from a hero and discard 1 status card from it.

name: Unflappable
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you defend against an attack and take no damage, exhaust Unflappable → draw 1 card.

flavor: "That should hold him for a spell." -- Doctor Strange
name: Crimson Bands of Cyttorak
text: Special: Stun an enemy and deal 7 damage to it. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "By the Vapors of Valtorr, be transformed!" -- Doctor Strange
name: Vapors of Valtorr
text: Special: Choose a status card in play. Replace that status card with a different status card. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

name: Winds of Watoomb
text: Special: Draw 3 cards. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "I've got an idea for how to make this suit even better."
name: Iron Man
text: Reduce the cost to play each upgrade on Iron Man by 1.
